title: ResourceType
description: Declarations of resource types for use within this API

children.title: displayName
children.description: The displayName attribute specifies the resource type display name. It is a friendly name used only for  display or documentation purposes. If displayName is not specified, it defaults to the element's key (the name of the property itself).

children.title: usage
children.description: Instructions on how and when the resource type should be used.

children.title: is
children.description: A list of the traits to apply to all methods declared (implicitly or explicitly) for this resource. Individual methods may override this declaration

children.title: securedBy
children.description: The security schemes that apply to all methods declared (implicitly or explicitly) for this resource.

children.title: type
children.description: The resource type which this resource inherits.
